title: Cafe Palaver
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Organic, European, German, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Small, busy cafe in a quiet backyard surrounded by plants. Offers breakfast, changing lunches, house-made cake, and has soy milk for coffee. Usually at least one vegetarian choice at lunch. On Thursday there is always vegetarian and vegan food (Donnerstag ist Veggietag). Sources organic and regional produce.
